TCGA-THCA-RBN: Using replicate samples that are common between batches, RBN adjusts the means and standard deviations of all the antibodies in the batches so that the means and standard deviations of the replicates become the same in all the batches.
Thyroid carcinoma (THCA) Replicated Based Normalization data, which combines the THCA samples of bach A and B.
This dataset should be used for the cross-batch analysis of THCA samples.
